articles.description: Darlene Love is really feeling the love this holiday season ... her shows have sold out after getting blessings from Mariah Carey, who deemed her the ultimate Queen of Christmas.
articles.content:
Darlene Love is feeling the love this holiday season ... her shows have sold out after getting blessings from Mariah Carey, who anointed her the ultimate Queen of Christmas.
